LOGIN.LOGIN_START: Log in to start your session

NAVIGATION_MENU.TASKS_APPTS_DOCS_SUB: Tool for grouping, translating, and publishing tasks, appointments, and documents.
NAVIGATION_MENU.POSTS_SUB: Tool for publishing general announcements and treatment team messages.
NAVIGATION_MENU.EDU_MATERIAL_SUB: Tool for referencing educational material hosted on the web.
NAVIGATION_MENU.HOSPITAL_MAPS_SUB: Tool for referencing hospital maps and creating QR codes.
NAVIGATION_MENU.TEST_RESULTS_SUB: Tool for publishing lab test results categorized by test group.
NAVIGATION_MENU.LEGACY_QUESTIONNAIRE_SUB: Manage the lagacy version of the patient-reported outcome questionnaires.
NAVIGATION_MENU.DIAGNOSIS_TRANSLATION_SUB: Manage diagnosis codes for labelling, translating, and categorization.
NAVIGATION_MENU.CRON_LOGS_SUB: Control publishing event times and frequency. View publishing logs.
NAVIGATION_MENU.PATIENTS_SUB: List of registered patient. Publishing control per patient.
NAVIGATION_MENU.PATIENT_ACTIVITY_SUB: List of patient sessions, login/logout time, and app activity.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Questionnaires
DASHBOARD.MANAGE_QUESTIONNAIRES_SUB: Create, view, update and delete questionnaires.
DASHBOARD.RESPONSE_TYPES_SUB: Create, view, update and delete response types.
DASHBOARD.MANAGE_QUESTIONS_SUB: View and edit all the questions stored in the question bank.
DASHBOARD.PUBLICATION_TOOLS_SUB: Publish and send questionnaires to patients.
